title: Nazo no Kanojo X (Mysterious Girlfriend X)
synopsis: First encounters are always memorable because regardless of the outcome, new experiences are sure to happen. For Akira Tsubaki, a young boy who knows next to nothing about girls, and new transfer student Mikoto Urabe, a mysterious girl who wears a cold facade, their first encounter takes a turn for the romantic.
related_anime: ['Nazo no Kanojo X: Nazo no Natsu Matsuri', 'Nazo no Kanojo X']
